t: How can i use two of kustom pa 50 together and plug ...
s: connect your commuter (using headphone jack using 3.5mm cable) to your 50 watt Kustom PA speakers aux port. connect a mic cable to "sync out" on back of speaker. Feed over to second speaker and connect to "sync In". Use master controls on both speakers to control volume to each speaker.
